name: Inoreader Tags to Colours w CheckMark
description:
Must have a tag called '.done'.

Useful for applying for jobs and you need to mark items you have already applied for.
*Note - the checkmark is not interactive, it is only an icon to help with sorting.

Works well with my Autohotkey script...to checkmark with a single keyboard shortcut. see below.

Looks good with my other user style "Nicer Inoreader Cleaner"
additional_info:
OPTIONAL - 
You can use an Autohotkey script to tag an item with one keyboard press.

Because the tag begins with a dot '.'  (again, it should be ".done") the tag can be selected with keyboard strokes in a  sequence. The Autohotkey script is below. 
To trigger it, press "Alt + J"

------------------------------script below-----------------

!j:: 
SendInput {t}
sleep 300
SendInput {.}
sleep 300
SendInput {enter}
sleep 300
SendInput {enter}
return
